title: Your first location
description: Get XPloring!
clue: Scan one of our QR codes

title: Spot the library tree
description: When in the library, see if you can spot our tree
clue: Try the ground floor

title: Pop in for a drink in Trevor
description: See if you can find Trevor, Furness College Bar
feedback: You've found Trevor! Stop for a drink, you've earned it
clue: Try just off Alex Square

title: Your first audio
description: All our locations have extra info about them. Give it a listen when you next find a location.
clue: Try 'hear more'

title: First words
description: All our locations have extra info written about them. They're well worth a read!
clue: Try 'read more'

title: Hello Future
description: See if you can find The Base, the base of your future career! It's where our careers service is based
clue: Not far from the library

title: In the Zone
description: You'll be in the zone (the learning one) if you unlock this achievement
clue: Not a million miles from the library

title: Your first taste of AR
description: There's a lot more to see about each of our locations...give it a try!
clue: Try 'see more' next time you're at a location

title: Discover 5 locations
description: Discover 5 locations on campus
clue: You can discover a location by scanning its QR code

title: Read more about 5 locations
description: You can find out much more about campus by tapping 'read more'. See how quick you can find out about 5
clue: Tapping 'read more' is the way to go

title: Bowland Pie
description: Bowland is known for its famous pies. Once you've found Bowland Bar, why not stop for one?
clue: Just off Alex Sq to the north

title: Discover 10 locations
description: Who will be first to discover 10 locations?
clue: Scan the QR code to unlock a location and discover more about it

title: Go crazy for AR
description: See 5 different locations in AR to unlock this
clue: Tapping 'see more' allows you to view AR

title: Find LUSU
description: Find your students union building
clue: Not far from the Learning Zone

title: Find Fylde Bar
description: Find Fylde Bar. It's a great stop off for lunch
clue: If you find Furness Bar, you're on your way to unlocking this achievement

title: Find George Fox
description: We don't have too many foxes on campus. But we do have a George Fox. Find his building
clue: Make your way towards South Campus

title: Find your way in work
description: A lot of seminars happen round by Bowland. See if you can find the rooms.
clue: Make your way towards North Campus

title: Go even crazier for AR
description: 10 ARs sound much better than 5, don't you think?
clue: Tapping 'see more' just 5 times seems not enough

title: Chillin' in County
description: County is a great place to chill. See if you can find it
clue: The ducks will help you achieve this one!

title: South Campus Safari
description: Many of our colleges are on South Campus. Try and find them all!
clue: Start down at Cartmel and work your way up

title: North Campus Explorer
description: Many of our colleges are on North Campus. Try and find them all!
clue: Start up at County and work your way down

title: Bowland Mad
description: Bowland is a big college. See if you can find all its QR codes
clue: Bowland Mad sounds a lot like Bowland Main, or Bowland Seminar Rooms. Well, almost.

title: Cool Computing
description: Our computing department is based in InfoLab. It's well worth the walk
clue: Make your way past Grizedale and you can't miss it. In computing, we like Green and Orange.

title: Hogroastin'
description: You'll be talk of the boar farm if you unlock this achievement. See if you can find the College that is roastin' the mosting
clue: Not far from our old friend George.

title: Bookworm
description: You can't say you know everything about a place until you've read everything about it
clue: Read more about all our locations

title: Party animal
description: Lonsdale is known as the party college. You won't be able to miss their bar
clue: Lonsdale is towards the far south

title: Become a campus know-it-all
description: Discover all our locations
clue: To unlock this requires commitment, specifically, commitment to scanning all our QR codes. Who will be first?

title: Hear-it-all
description: Hear more about 5 locations
clue: Tapping 'hear more' gives you an audio file. Just do that 5 times!

title: Clever College
description: Grad college is reserved for, well, grads. Go and meet the clever among us!
clue: Not far from Cartmel, on Alex Park

title: End of the line
description: By no means the end of the game, just the southern most college. Try and find it!
clue: Keep on truckin, by which we mean, keep on going south.

title: College champion
description: To be a true college champion, visit all 9 colleges on campus!
clue: Each college has its own QR code. Start at the top of campus and work your way down to the bottom.

title: Theatrics
description: We have our own theatre on campus. See if you can get a front row seat.
clue: The far north of campus is a good shout, not far from the ducks
